Lunarpine stepped back as he was requested to. "You're afraid of me being c=
lose to your base?" he tried to supress a laugh, the odds were at least a d=
ozen to one against him and the Predacons wanted him to step back.

ups.com

  Bat probes/Shivah. 

  Still, the bat probes was wacthing at =
Lunarpine, when they noticed that he was so close of the base they reported=
 it to Shivah. 

  Shivah opened com link with Lunarpine ans said in a tone=
 that meaned that he wasn't in mood "If you don't move 200 meters back, I d=
on't leave the base and I'll command to Predacons that kill your friends...=
!"

    waiting for.=
 He would soon meet the reason for all thier problems. He didn't
